name: Deep in the jungle
description:
Welcome to the jungle!

Washed up on shore, you wake up on a deserted island.(Or is it?) Fight, run or sneak past legions of cannibals in order to find shelter and survive.

Deep in the jungle you will find your salvation!

Use w/a/s/d keys or arrows to move around. You can also defend yourself using the left click of the mouse and aiming with the cursor to hit the canibals.
